Class SlotService

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.SlotService
public class SlotService extends Object
Service class for managing gym time slots. Handles adding, updating, and deleting slots, as well as managing seat capacity.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SlotService()
    Instantiates a new slot service and initializes the DAO.

  • Method Details

    • setSlotDAO

      public void setSlotDAO(SlotDAO slotDAO)
      Sets the slot DAO implementation.
      Parameters:
      slotDAO - the slot DAO to use

    • addSlot

      public boolean addSlot(int centerId, LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime, int totalSeats)
      Adds a new time slot to a gym center.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the ID of the gym center
      startTime - the start time of the slot
      endTime - the end time of the slot
      totalSeats - the total capacity of the slot
      Returns:
      true if the slot was added successfully

    • getSlotById

      public Slot getSlotById(int slotId)
      Retrieves slot details by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the unique ID of the slot
      Returns:
      the Slot object

    • getSlotsByCenter

      public List<Slot> getSlotsByCenter(int centerId)
      Retrieves all slots for a specific gym center.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the ID of the gym center
      Returns:
      a list of slots for that center

    • getAvailableSlotsByCenter

      public List<Slot> getAvailableSlotsByCenter(int centerId)
      Retrieves only the slots that have available seats for a specific gym center.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the ID of the gym center
      Returns:
      a list of available slots

    • updateSlot

      public boolean updateSlot(Slot updatedSlot)
      Updates an existing slot's details.
      Parameters:
      updatedSlot - the Slot object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful

    • deleteSlot

      public boolean deleteSlot(int slotId)
      Deletes a specific slot from the system.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the unique ID of the slot
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful

    • hasAvailableSeats

      public boolean hasAvailableSeats(int slotId)
      Checks if a slot has at least one available seat.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the ID of the slot to check
      Returns:
      true if available seats > 0

    • decreaseAvailableSeats

      public boolean decreaseAvailableSeats(int slotId)
      Decreases the available seat count for a slot by 1 (e.g., when a booking is confirmed).
      Parameters:
      slotId - the ID of the slot
      Returns:
      true if seat count was successfully decreased

    • increaseAvailableSeats

      public boolean increaseAvailableSeats(int slotId)
      Increases the available seat count for a slot by 1 (e.g., when a booking is cancelled).
      Parameters:
      slotId - the ID of the slot
      Returns:
      true if seat count was successfully increased

    • getAllSlots

      public List<Slot> getAllSlots()
      Retrieves all slots in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all slots

    • displaySlot

      public void displaySlot(Slot slot)
      Helper method to display slot details to the console.
      Parameters:
      slot - the slot to display

    • displaySlotsByCenter

      public void displaySlotsByCenter(int centerId)
      Displays all slots for a center to the console.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the ID of the gym center
